TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputText extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputText Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 和 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML and elements on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制項來建立單行文字方塊中，可讓使用者輸入文字或密碼。Use the control to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter text or a password. 屬性會指定可以在文字方塊中輸入的字元數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. 屬性可讓您指定文字方塊的寬度。The property allows you to specify the width of the text box. 若要判斷使用者輸入的文字方塊中的值，請使用屬性。To determine the value entered by the user into text box, use the property. 控制項提供事件所引發的時機屬性變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 這可讓您建立事件處理常式，每次引發事件時執行一組自訂的指示。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不提供內建的方式，回傳至伺服器。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 您必須提供支援張貼至伺服器，例如網頁上的另一個控制項控制項，將控制項的值傳送至伺服器。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the value of the control back to the server. 若要建立多行文字方塊中，使用控制項。To create a multi-line text box, use the control. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來取得使用者輸入的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/CS/htmlinputtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/VB/htmlinputtextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體控制使用預設值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它會建立`text`輸入文字方塊控制項。It creates a `text` type text box control. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 文字 」 常值字串。The "text" literal string.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor/CS/htmlinputtextctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor/VB/htmlinputtextctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string type) cil managed

span.span: The type of input control.

summary.span: 使用指定的輸入控制項型別來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified input control type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體控制使用指定的輸入的控制項類型。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using the specified input control type. 它可讓您建立特定類型的文字方塊控制項，例如`password`。It allows you to create a specific type of text box control, such as `password`. 只有`password`或`text`目前支援的類型。Only the `password` or `text` type is currently supported. 這個建構函式的設計可讓您建立其他文字類型 box 處理，如果它們變成可用。This constructor is designed to allow you to create other text box types if they become available. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`type` 參數的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以使用這個建構函式來建立`text`類型文字方塊控制項，預設建構函式通常改為使用。Although you can use this constructor to create a `text` type text box control, the default constructor is commonly used instead. ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor2/CS/htmlinputtextctor2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor2/VB/htmlinputtextctor2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查是否的回傳值控制項不同於先前的值，以及如果是的話，會傳回`true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定可以在文字方塊中輸入的字元數目上限。Use the property to specify or determine the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定可以在文字方塊中輸入的字元數目上限。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使其設定至 30 個字元，在自訂屬性伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it sets the property to 30 characters in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnServerChange(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnServerChange (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時在伺服器上變更屬性。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自訂事件處理常式更新網頁上顯示的文字方塊中輸入文字值的標籤``HTML 項目。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the text entered into the `` HTML element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/CS/htmlinputtextserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/VB/htmlinputtextserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostDataChangedEvent() cil managed

summary.span: 呼叫 方法以通知 控制項，表示控制項的狀態已變更。

span.span: Calls the method to signal the control that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法以便正確地引發事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the event is correctly raised.

summary.span: 發生於 屬性在伺服器上變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property is changed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時在伺服器上變更屬性。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自訂事件處理常式更新網頁上顯示的文字方塊中輸入文字值的標籤``HTML 項目。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the text entered into the `` HTML element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/CS/htmlinputtextserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/VB/htmlinputtextserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定文字方塊的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the contents of the text box.

value.span: 文字方塊中包含的文字。

span.span: The text contained in the text box.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷使用者在文字方塊中輸入的文字。Use the property to programmatically determine the text entered by the user into the text box. 您也可以使用這個屬性來提供預設文字的文字方塊。You can also use this property to provide default text for the text box. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的值`password`類型控制，請在文字方塊中不會顯示值。If you specify a value for a `password` type control, that value is not displayed in the text box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷使用者在文字方塊中輸入的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically determine the text entered by the user in the text box. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/CS/htmlinputtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/VB/htmlinputtextvb.aspx#1)]
